dc:title: Day After Day - July/August 1941
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Diary-like account of a trip to Catholic Worker houses and farms through the Midwest. Ends on retreat in Pittsburgh given by Fr. Hugo and says they left renewed, with a new perspective.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 373 1941-07-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
